title: ‘Hope India will support us at UN’ meet:  Sri Lankan minister at Thiruvananthapuram
content: Submitted by Walter Jayawardhana “India has to take a decision and we hope that the country is noticing the efforts taken by Sri Lanka for restoring human rights.” He was in Kerala to unveil the statue of Buddha at the Sree Buddha College of Engineering at Nooranad. “We had opportunity to spread Buddhism to many…
